Topic.Title: my game is suddenly not working! help!

Posts.EditableText:
my game has been working fine up until now, when suddenly whenever i click on something, just just displays that command instead of doing it. i'll click on an object and click "look at" and the game will just display "look at [object]" instead of doing what its always done. i dont understand what i could've done to cause this. i dont want to lose all my work, help!

i dont know if this is on my end or what, but here's a link so you can see what i mean
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/rzcoktsrik2wlxfijv7d_w/a-flower-a-daybeta

Posts.EditableText:
I can't figure out what's causing that. It does the same for unresolved commands; which must mean that it's not getting as far as HandleSingleCommand. I just can't figure out why not.

I'll take another look at it later.
